name: A Final Sacrifice
rules: Target hero or ally in your party has +3 ATK / +3 health this turn. At the start of the next turn, destroy it.

name: A Flawless Advance
rules: Ongoing: When an ally with cost equal to the number of resources you control enters your party, put a a strength counter on A Flawless Advance.; Allies in your party have +1 ATK / +1 health for each strength counter.

name: Atonement
rules: Prevent all damage that target hero or ally would deal this turn.

name: Blessing of the Heavens
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK / +2 health.; When attached ally is destroyed, you may put Blessing of the Heavens from its owner's graveyard into his hand.

name: Blizzard
rules: Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to each hero and ally in that opponent's party. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.; When a card leaves your hand, destroy Blizzard.

name: Burly Bellow
rules: Opposing allies have -5 ATK this turn.

name: Center of Attention
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally is AWESOME! (At the start of your turn, each player may compliment this ally. If he does, he draws a card.)

name: Clutch Shot
rules: Target ally has +2 ATK this turn. A second target ally has -2 ATK this turn.

name: Combustion
rules: Fire Hero Required; Your hero deals X fire damage to each hero and ally, where X is target ally's health.

name: Cowering Shout
rules: Target ally has -3 ATK / -3 health this turn.

name: Curse of Endless Suffering
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character.; 3 -> Search your deck for a card named Curse of Endless Suffering and attach it to attach it to attached character.

name: Curse of Midnight
rules: Attach to target hero, and you may turn it face down.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero.

name: Dark Justice
rules: Remove target ally from the game and put damage on your hero equal to that ally's ATK.

name: Darkest Before the Light
rules: Your hero heals all damage from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Deadliness
rules: Subtlety Hero Required; Choose one or more: Destroy target exhausted ally; destroy target exhausted equipment; destroy target exhausted resource.

name: Defiance
rules: Protection Hero Required; Ongoing: Only one character can attack on each opponent's turn.

name: Disappear
rules: Your hero is Elusive this turn. (It can't be attacked.)

name: Disperse Magic
rules: Ongoing: Destroy Disperse Magic -> Destroy target ability.

name: Divine Favor
rules: Holy Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust], Remove the top X cards of your deck from the game -> Your hero heals X damage from target hero or ally.

name: Divine Justice
rules: Exhaust target ready opposing ally. If you do, you may have it deal melee damage equal to its ATK to a second target ally.

name: Double Time
rules: Ready target equipment.

name: Echo Totem
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may remove a non-ongoing ability card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, you can play that card without paying its cost this turn.

name: Foam Sword Rack
rules: Ongoing: 1 -> Your hero deals 1/2 melee damage to target hero. Any player can use this power.

name: Focused Will
rules: Discipline Hero Required; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, switch all damage on your hero with the damage on target opposing hero.

name: Fork Lightning
rules: Your hero deals 5 nature damage to target hero and 5 nature damage to target ally.

name: Friends in High Places
rules: Put two Treant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: Glimmer of Hope
rules: Interrupt target ability card that's targeting a card in play you control.

name: Greater Chain Heal
rules: Target up to five heroes and/or allies. Your hero heals 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.

name: Grim Reach
rules: Affliction Hero Required; Opposing heroes and allies have -1 health this turn for each ongoing ability you control.

name: Heartburn
rules: Your hero deals 4 fire damage to target hero or ally and 1 fire damage to each other hero and ally in that character's party.

name: Horrify
rules: Target player destroys an ally in his party. If he does, your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's cost.

name: Improvised Weaponry
rules: Attach to target Melee weapon.; Ongoing: Attached weapon loses Melee(1), has Ranged(1), becomes a [Ranged] weapon, and has When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat.

name: Intuition
rules: Remove target attacker from combat. You may ready it.

name: Mana Ruby
rules: Ongoing: 2, Destroy Mana Ruby -> Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size.

name: Meltdown
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals X fire damage to target ally; or destroy target weapon with cost X.

name: Nature's Reach
rules: Balance Hero Required; Ongoing: Ally tokens in your party have +1 ATK / +1 health.; 3, [Exhaust] -> Put a Treant ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: Optimize
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> You may ready or exhaust target resource.

name: Poof!
rules: Target ally's controller removes it from the game. At the start of the next turn, he puts it into his party.

name: Power Word: Restore
rules: Attach to target hero, and you may turn it face up.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached hero.

name: Pulverize
rules: Choose one: Destroy target damaged ally; or destroy target ability or equipment with one or more counters.

name: Quickdraw
rules: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally entered play this turn.

name: Recall from the Brink
rules: Put target ally or weapon card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

name: Reckoning of the Light
rules: Destroy each ability and equipment with which damage was dealt to your hero this game.

name: Reforestation
rules: Destroy target ability or equipment. Put three Treant ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: Ritual of Summoning
rules: Ongoing: On your turn: Exhaust your hero and two allies in your party -> Put an ally card from your collection into play.

name: Sacred Moment
rules: Cards in play can't ready until after your next turn.

name: Scatter Shot
rules: Marksmanship Hero Required; Your hero deals ranged damage to target hero or ally equal to 1 plus the combined ATK of your Ranged weapons. If a hero is dealt damage this way, its controller can't play cards this turn.

name: Sear
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally was dealt damage this turn.
reprinted: Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Shield Wall
rules: Put three Wall armor tokens into play with 1 DEF.

name: Slash and Dash
rules: Ongoing: When Slash and Dash enters play, you may destroy target exhauste ally.; Your hero has Stealth. (Can't protect against it.); When your hero deals damage, destroy Slash and Dash.

name: Splinter Mind
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: You control attached ally.; At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached ally.

name: Stab in the Dark
rules: Look at target opponent's hand and choose an ally card. He discards that card.

name: Starshot
rules: Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally.; Draw a card.

name: Strength of Earth Totem
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK.; (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Surgical Strikes
rules: Ongoing: When a hero or ally in your party deals combat damage to a defending hero, its controller discards a card.

name: The Aim of Eagles
rules: Your hero deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally. Ready one of your resources for each damage dealt this way.

name: The Benefits of Practice
rules: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally. You may choose on of your weapons. If you do, put a +1 ATK counter on it for each damage dealt this way.

name: The Crash of Tides
rules: Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from a second target hero or ally for each damage dealt this way.

name: The Depth of Shadows
rules: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally. Its controller destroys one of his resources for each damage dealt this way.

name: The Omens of Terror
rules: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Its controller reveals a card in his hand for each damage dealt this way. Choose a revealed card, and he discards it.

name: The Promises of Darkness
rules: Your hero deals 1 shadow damage to target hero or ally. For each damage dealt this way, put 1 damage on your hero and draw a card.

name: The Rewards of Faith
rules: Your hero deals 1 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. For each damage dealt this way, prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to a second hero or ally this turn.

name: The Sowing of Seeds
rules: Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally. For each damage dealt this way, put a Treant ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: The Taste of Arcana
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may interrupt a card played by its controller unless he pays 1 for each damage dealt this way.

name: Tidal Mastery
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Ongoing: Exhaust four of your Totems -> Your hero deals 10 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Tiger's Fury
rules: Ongoing: 1 -> Your hero has an additional +1 ATK while attacking in cat form this turn.

name: Tremor Shock
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage and 1 nature damage to target hero or ally. An ally dealt damage this way can't attack this turn. If a hero was dealt damage this way, you may interrupt an ability card played by its controller.

name: Utopia
rules: Destroy all tokens. Put each other ability, ally, and equipment into its owner's resource row face down, then exhaust them.

name: Victimize
rules: Target player discards two cards and you draw two cards.

name: Volley
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.; When your hero is dealt damage, destroy Volley.

name: Yoink!
rules: Attach to target equipment.; Ongoing: You control attached equipment.

rules: Protector;Hardiness (If this ally would be dealt damage, prevent 1 of it.);2, Destroy another ally in your party -> Destroy target weapon.

name: Bolton
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

rules: Broll has +1 ATK / +1 health for each Arena card in play you control.

rules: Arcane Torrent (When this ally enters play, target opposing card in play loses and can't have powers this turn.)

name: Chillhands Spigotgulp
rules: If you would draw a card, you may skip drawing it instead.; When you skip drawing a card this way, target ally can't attack this turn.

rules: If you would draw a card, you may skip drawing it instead.; When you skip drawing a card this way, Cracklehands deals 2 arcane damage to target ally.

rules: Remove an ally card in your graveyard from the game -> Edward is a Protector this turn.

rules: Inspiring Presence (If a hero or ally in your party would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +1 instead)

rules: Arena allies in your party are Protectors.

rules: Arena allies in your party are Elusive.

rules: Arena allies in your party are Protectors.

rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, choose an opponent, and he may draw a card.; Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.

name: The Ring of Blood: The Blue Brothers
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, choose an opponent, and he may put two Broken Arena ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.; Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: The Ring of Blood: The Final Challenge
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, put 2 damage on your hero.; Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Ring of Blood: The Warmaul Champion
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, put the top three cards of your deck into your graveyard.; Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Uncatalogued Species
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Name a standard race, then reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally card of that race into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Divine Favor
rules: Holy Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust], Remove the top X cards of your deck from the game -> Your hero heals X damage from target hero or ally.

name: Broll Bearmantle
rules: Broll has +1 ATK / +1 health for each Arena card in play you control.

name: Sandbox Tiger
rules: Sandbox Tiger has +1 ATK / +1 health for each Loot card in play you control.

name: Rehgar Earthfury
rules: [Alliance] allies in your party have +1 health.; [Horde] allies in your party have +1 ATK.; When Rehgar attacks, gain control of target ally.

name: Gladiator Ryno
rules: When Ryno or another Arena ally enters your party, put a Felhunter Demon ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: Gladiator Kaniya
rules: Arena allies in your party are Protectors.

name: Gladiator Lanthus
rules: Arena allies in your party have [Exhaust] -> Exhaust target ally.

name: Foam Sword Rack
rules: Ongoing: 1 -> Your hero deals 1/2 melee damage to target hero. Any player can use this power.

name: Center of Attention
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally is AWESOME! (At the start of your turn, each player may compliment this ally. If he does, he draws a card.)

name: The Ring of Blood: The Warmaul Champion
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, put the top three cards of your deck into your graveyard.; Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Dark Justice
rules: Remove target ally from the game and put damage on your hero equal to that ally's ATK.

name: Boundless Agony
rules: Heroes and allies can't be healed.; Damage that would be dealt is unpreventable.

name: Anduin Wrynn
rules: Other friendly Humans can protect Andiun.; On your turn: [Exhaust] -> Search your deck for a Human ally card and put it into play.

name: Focused Will
rules: Discipline Hero Required; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, switch all damage on your hero with the damage on target opposing hero.

name: Shuriken of Negation
rules: When Shuriken of Negation enters play, you may interrupt target ability card.; Thrown (When you stike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. At the end of this turn, put this weapon into its owner's hand.)

name: The Circle of Blood
rules: When a hero or ally in your party deals damage, add an arena counter.; [Exhaust], Remove three arena counters -> Put an Arena Gladiator ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: The Decapitator
rules: 0 ->The Decapitator has Thrown this turn. (When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. At the end of this turn, put this weapon into its owner's hand.)

name: The Ring of Blood: Brokentoe
rules: As a cost to play this face up, discard a card.; Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: The Ring of Blood: Rokdar the Sundered Lord
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, remove 2 damage from an opposing hero.; Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Ring of Blood: Skra'gath
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, choose an opponent, and he may draw a card.; Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.

name: The Ring of Blood: The Blue Brothers
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, choose an opponent, and he may put two Broken Arena ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.; Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: Twinblade of the Phoenix
rules: You can play Twinblade of the Phoenix from your graveyard.

name: Vol'jin
rules: Vol'jin has +X ATK, where X is the combined damage on Trolls in your party.

name: World Breaker
rules: On your turn: 6, [Exhaust], Destroy World Breaker -> Destroy all resources.

name: Meltdown
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals X fire damage to target ally; or destroy target weapon with cost X.

name: Grim Reach
rules: Affliction Hero Required; Opposing heroes and allies have -1 health this turn for each ongoing ability you control.

name: Gladiator Meganna
rules: Arena allies in your party have Stealth.

name: Ossus the Ancient
rules: Draenei Hero Required;Inspiring Presence; Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt.

name: Gladiator Boum
rules: Arena allies in your party have Ferocity.

name: Gladiator Sepirion
rules: When each Arena ally in your party attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready it.

name: Boggspine Knuckles
rules: Your hero has dual wield.; Boggspine Knuckles has +3 ATK while while your hero has more damage than an opposing hero.

name: The Ring of Blood: The Final Challenge
rules: As a cost to place this quest face up, put 2 damage on your hero.; Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Kreedom
rules: At the start of your turn, Kreedom deals 1 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally for each ability you control attached to that character.

name: Shield Wall
rules: Put three Wall armor tokens into play with 1 DEF.

name: Sacred Moment
rules: Cards in play can't ready until after your next turn.

name: Defiance
rules: Protection Hero Required; Ongoing: Only one character can attack on each opponent's turn.

name: Phase Hound
rules: Stealth (Can't protect against this character.)

name: Lo'Gosh
rules: Protector; Opposing heroes and allies have -1 ATK / -1 health while in combat with Lo'Gosh for each Arena ally in your party.

name: Valeera Sanguinar
rules: You may discard an Arena card rather than pay Valeera's cost.

name: Combustion
rules: Fire Hero Required; Your hero deals X fire damage to each hero and ally, where X is target ally's health.
